content: I hope you received enough feedback from the community to improve your contribution. Once you have made the necessary updates, publish your contribution!
I hope you received enough feedback from the community to improve your contribution. Once you have made the necessary updates, publish your contribution!
Nice work! I like the game design and requirements.
Let's bee honest, I l<3ve flowery meadows! Gratz for the work!
i really like the name, also it teaches you nicely and visibly how flood fill works, so yeah.. great problem :D
I hope you received enough feedback from the community to improve your contribution. Once you have made the necessary updates, publish your contribution!
I hope you received enough feedback from the community to improve your contribution. Once you have made the necessary updates, publish your contribution!

I do not see the point of the rock feature: it is just a border, effectively restricting the playing field to 15x7.
The takeover feature does not play a meaningful role in the game because actual occurences are few. All is left is rushing to the center and upgrading your frontier as fast as possible.

Introduction
* (Level 3 statement) Please change "opponent'â€™'s territory" to "opponent's territory".

Rules - Map
* Consider changing "Map" to "Board".

* Consider changing "skirmish" to "match" (which is used in the "Beehives" section).

* Board square type 3: The description feels contradictory. It says the board can contain rock squares, but also that rocks do not appear inside the board. If the intention is that rock squares appear on the edges only, consider simplifying the last two sentences ("The board is always surrounded by rock squares. Rocks do not appear inside the board.") as:

All edge squares of the board are rock squares, and non-edge squares are never rock squares.

Rules - Player Territories
* Strictly speaking, the player outputs coordinates only, not a direction. Consider revising "then the best square moving in the given direction will be automatically calculated - and the expansion attempt will be performed on it" to:

in which case the expansion attempt will be performed on the best square between your territory and the chosen square.

(Or adjust the wording in another way that avoids mentioning a "given direction".)

* (Level 2 statement) These sentences appear twice:

  â€¢ You can expand the territory by occupying squares adjacent to the area you already own.
  
  â€¢ You can only occupy neutral squares.

Rules - square Levels
* Please change "square" to "Square" in the section heading.

* Consider adding the takeover neighbourhood clarification (as per @darkhorse64's comment) to the statement.

Rules - Bees
* Please change "one bee on" to "one bee spawns on" (twice).

Input in Each Turn
* Please delete "Next".

* Please change "<var>171</var>" to "<const>171</const>".

* Consider changing "map" to "board".

* Please change "square position on the x-coordinate" to "the x-coordinate of the square".

* Please change "square position on the y-coordinate" to "the y-coordinate of the square".

Output
* The text inconsistently switches between "we"/"our"/"us" and "you"/"your".

Stub
* Please change "square position on the x-coordinate" to "the x-coordinate of the square".

* Please change "square position on the y-coordinate" to "the y-coordinate of the square".

Thanks.
Also the game's mechanics are not properly polished, and I'm sure there are some bugs regarding the autopathfinding...

* The stub comments are in Polish
* For the takeover, does the game considers the 8 neighbourhood ?  Please clarify.
* I like the change of the second level. It helps to understand the real topic of the game.

forgot the stub - will do it in *not-too-distant* future
thanks - takeeover is still 4 dirs
but I'm pretty sure some things in the game are broken ^^'.

Will do!
In the future.
Some day.
I promise :*

I said the game has poor design, didn't I?
There was an additional league planned that would allow rocks to be placed in the middle of the board, so it justified adding them as game-related entity.
I hoped the takeover would be more useful.

Balancing how the bee evaluation works is also an area for improvement...
